<Text: The Schutzstaffel (SS; also stylized as with Armanen runes; ] ; literally "Protection Squadron") was a major paramilitary organization under Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party (NSDAP) in Nazi Germany, and later throughout German-occupied Europe during World War II.>
Triplets:<The Schutzstaffel
3:
Text: Schutzstaffel:  Under his direction (1929–45), it grew from a small paramilitary formation to one of the most powerful organizations in Nazi Germany.
